name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Charles J. EDWARDS, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Charles J. EDWARDS, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Commonwealth's petition for allowance of appeal is granted. The Order of the Superior Court is reversed, and the case is remanded to the Court of Common Pleas of Carbon County for a hearing on the question of prejudice. See Pa.R.Crim.P. 150; Commonwealth v. Revtai, 516 Pa. 53, 532 A.2d 1 (1987).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
537 A.2d 1350
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Charles J. EDWARDS, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 1, 1988.
